titles: [The Lamentation of] John Musgrave who was execued [sic] at Kendal for robbing the King's receiver, and taking away from him great store of treasure : to the tune of, Wharton.
author: Musgrave, John, fl. 1654.
publisher: Printed for J. Wright, J. Clark, W. Thackeray and T. Passenger,
notes: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
"The second part of the Lamentation of John Musgrave: to the same tune": p. [2].
